item.description:
This has been a difficult time for alot of members who belong to this group, we lost a long time member who was an inspiration to so many people. If he saw you at a dance hall first thing you notice was a  "Big  Smile" then he would grab your hand and go swing on the dance floor, he loved his Meet Up friends. I think we all have so many momentums we could share so I will leave it up to you guys to come down and share a drink, or a smile, or just to say "Richard this one is for you" along with a toast and a moment to reflect.

Whether you knew him or not come out to share and enjoy a night of dancing, mingling, or just to chill on a Friday night and meet some terrififc folks, this group is very sociable and welcomes everyone with an open desire to have a fun night.

I will get there around 7:30 to get us some tables, dinner is optional, great appetizers, main course and of course great drinks!!

 

Richard enjoyed "Mama Kicks" cause truthfully she will get you up there dancing, and she has top 40's along with her own mix.

 

Band: Mama Kicks

Time: 8pm
item.how_to_find_us: Will Have Mweet Up signs posted, as hostess for Meet Up tables

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: A Night Out To Honor/ Memorialize Our Dear "Richards Life" Dance Mama Kicks
